about.title: LinkedIn Text Formatter - Bold & Italic Generator | Boldify
about.description: Professional LinkedIn text formatter. Generate bold, italic, and styled text for your LinkedIn posts. Free online tool with instant preview.
about.keywords: linkedin formatter, linkedin text generator, linkedin bold text, linkedin italic, social media formatter, linkedin post tool
about.hero_description: Transform your plain text into professionally formatted LinkedIn posts with bold, italic, and styled text that stands out in your professional network.
about.bold_generator_desc: Create bold text that captures attention and emphasizes key points in your LinkedIn posts.
about.italic_formatting_desc: Add elegant italic styling to highlight quotes, thoughts, and important messages.
about.copy_ready_desc: Instantly copy your formatted text and paste directly into LinkedIn posts.
about.cta_title: Ready to Format Your LinkedIn Posts?
about.cta_description: Use our free LinkedIn text formatter to create professional, eye-catching posts.
about.step1_desc: Type your LinkedIn post content in the editor
about.step2_desc: Choose text and apply bold, italic, or other formatting
about.step3_desc: Copy the formatted text and paste it into your LinkedIn post
about.benefit1_desc: Formatted posts attract more views, likes, and comments
about.benefit2_desc: Stand out with clean, well-formatted professional content
about.benefit3_desc: Formatted text is easier to scan and understand quickly
about.benefit4_desc: Well-formatted content performs better in LinkedIn's algorithm

help.title: Help & FAQ - LinkedIn Text Formatting Guide | Boldify
help.description: Complete help guide for LinkedIn text formatting. Learn how to use bold, italic text in LinkedIn posts. FAQ and troubleshooting tips.
help.keywords: linkedin help, linkedin formatting guide, linkedin bold text help, how to format linkedin posts, linkedin text formatting FAQ
help.hero_description: Everything you need to know about formatting text for LinkedIn posts. Get help with bold, italic, and other text formatting features.
help.need_help_desc: Can't find the answer you're looking for? We're here to help you get the most out of Boldify.
help.faq1_q: How does LinkedIn text formatting work?
help.faq1_a1: Our tool uses Unicode mathematical characters that display as bold, italic, or other styled text on LinkedIn. These characters are natively supported by LinkedIn and work across all devices and platforms.
help.faq1_a2: Unlike HTML formatting, these Unicode characters become part of the text itself, ensuring compatibility everywhere LinkedIn is accessed.
help.faq2_a: Yes! Boldify is completely free to use. There are no hidden costs, subscription fees, or registration requirements. You can format unlimited LinkedIn posts at no charge.
help.faq3_q: Will formatted text work on mobile devices?
help.faq3_a: Absolutely! The Unicode characters we use are supported across all platforms including iOS, Android, and desktop. Your formatted text will display correctly whether your connections view it on mobile apps or web browsers.
help.faq5_q: How do I make text bold in LinkedIn posts?
help.faq5_a1: To make text bold in LinkedIn:
help.faq5_step1: Type your text in our editor
help.faq5_step2: Select the text you want to make bold
help.faq5_step3: Click the Bold (B) button in the toolbar
help.faq5_step5: Paste it directly into your LinkedIn post
help.faq6_q: Why isn't my formatted text displaying correctly?
help.faq6_a1: If your formatted text isn't displaying properly, try these solutions:
help.faq6_sol1: Make sure you're copying the entire formatted text from the preview
help.faq6_sol2: Paste directly into LinkedIn without additional formatting
help.faq6_sol3: Avoid copying from other applications that might alter the characters
help.faq6_sol4: Try refreshing your browser if the editor isn't working properly
help.faq7_q: Can I use this for other social media platforms?
help.faq7_a1: Yes! While Boldify is optimized for LinkedIn, the Unicode formatting works on many other platforms including:
help.faq7_a2: However, each platform may display the characters slightly differently.
help.bp1_desc: Bold text is most effective when used for key points, headings, or calls-to-action. Overusing it reduces impact.
help.bp2_desc: LinkedIn is a professional platform. Use formatting to enhance clarity and readability, not for decorative purposes.
help.bp3_desc: Always preview your formatted text using our preview feature before posting to ensure it looks correct.

error.title: Error - Boldify | LinkedIn Text Formatter
error.description: An error occurred while accessing Boldify. Return to formatting your LinkedIn posts.
error.keywords: error, page not found, boldify, linkedin formatter, help
error.bad_request_desc: Your request is invalid. Please check the information entered and try again.
error.unauthorized_desc: You are not authorized to access this resource.
error.forbidden_desc: Access to this page is forbidden. You don't have the necessary permissions.
error.not_found_desc: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. Don't worry, let's get back to formatting your LinkedIn posts!
error.server_error_desc: An unexpected error occurred on the server. We are working to resolve this issue.
error.bad_gateway_desc: The server received an invalid response. Please try again in a few moments.
error.service_unavailable_desc: The service is temporarily unavailable. We are performing maintenance operations.
